body.raw:
### Overview UploadShad is a powerful and easy-to-use file uploader component designed for ShadCN forms and React applications. It provides seamless integration, customizable options, and robust handling of file uploads. ##### Breakdown - Install Shadcn and dependant components - Install UploadShad dependencies - Install UploadShad
### Run the ShadCN CLI Run the shadcn-ui init command and setup your project with Shadcn.
```bash pnpx shadcn@latest init ``` ### Add UploadShad This will add UploadShad & install it's required dependencies into your project.
```bash pnpx shadcn@latest add https://uploadshad.nerfdesigns.com/registry/uploadshad.json ``` This uses the (new) ShadCN CLI. ### Environment Variable For UploadShad to upload & delete images in your S3 Bucket, add these AWS configuration Environment Variables to your .env file. UploadShad ensures that variables without the "NEXT_PUBLIC" prefix remain secured on the server, and are not exposed to the client.
``` NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL= AWS_BUCKET_NAME= AWS_BUCKET_REGION= AWS_BUCKET_ACCESS_KEY= AWS_BUCKET_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY= AWS_BUCKET_PRODUCTION_FOLDER= NEXT_PUBLIC_AWS_BASE_URL= ``` ### Enable Toasts in your project (optional) Notification Toasts are used to show feedback to the user for various states, and error messages. Add the Sonner Toaster to your highest/closest .layout file.
``` export default function RootLayout({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) { return ( {children} ); } ``` ### Thats it! You have successfully installed UploadShad into your project. ðŸŽ‰ Now you can [start using UploadShad in your Forms](/uploadshad/). Alternatively, you can [learn how UploadShad works under the hood]("/uploadshad)
### Resources - Learn more about [ShadCN CLI](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/cli) - Learn more about [Integrating with Shadcn Form](/uploadshad/uploadshad-shadcn-form-integration) - Learn more about [how file state management works](/uploadshad/file-state-management), useful for more custom integrations/use cases.

UploadShad to upload & delete images in your S3 Bucket, add these AWS configuration Environment Variables to your .env file.\r
UploadShad ensures that variables without the "NEXT_PUBLIC" prefix remain secured on the server, and are not exposed to the client.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:44,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)("br",{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:47,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:`NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL=<http://localhost:3000 ensure you update this in production>\r
AWS_BUCKET_NAME=<bucket name>\r
AWS_BUCKET_REGION=<bucket region>\r
AWS_BUCKET_ACCESS_KEY=<your access key>\r
AWS_BUCKET_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=<your secret key>\r
AWS_BUCKET_PRODUCTION_FOLDER=<example folder>\r
NEXT_PUBLIC_AWS_BASE_URL=<https://example.s3.region.amazonaws.com>
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:49,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:49,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.h3,{children:"Enable Toasts in your project (optional)"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:59,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Notification Toasts are used to show feedback to the user for various states, and error messages."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:61,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Add the Sonner Toaster to your highest/closest .layout file."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:63,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)("br",{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Charl\\Code\\Upload-Shad\\uploadshad-site\\content\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-4f48d8de-a0f8-4c47-964d-d355b1583eb1.mdx",lineNumber:65,columnNumber:1},this),(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:`export default function RootLayout({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {\r
